board_desc: Ocean battle chessboard. Dark squares are deep underwater scenes with coral reefs, sunken treasure, and bioluminescent sea life glowing in the depths. Light squares are weathered wooden ship deck planks with rope coils, anchor chains, and nautical details showing the texture of sea-worn timber. Back rows (1 and 8) feature the bow of a massive pirate ship on one side and an underwater palace entrance with flowing seaweed on the other. Middle rows (2-7) show the transition between surface and depths. Top-down orthographic view, cinematic ocean lighting with dramatic shadows, photorealistic textures, 8k resolution. Swashbuckling adventure atmosphere.
piece_desc: Pirates vs Mermaids in detailed realistic fantasy style. WHITE PIECES (Mermaids): White King: Mermaid King with trident, crown of coral and pearls, flowing fin tail, regal aquatic presence. White Queen: Beautiful mermaid queen with long flowing hair, shell crown, elegant fin tail, ethereal ocean beauty. White Bishops: Mermaid sea sorcerers with staffs made of coral and shells, mystical ocean magic. White Knights: Mermaids riding sea turtles. Sea turtles have large streamlined shells, flippers (NOT legs - flippers are paddle-like appendages for swimming), graceful swimming motion, wise ancient appearance. Mermaids have fin tails (NO LEGS), flowing hair, and ride sea turtles by sitting on the shell or holding onto the shell edge. Both maintain their natural aquatic forms - sea turtle with flippers for swimming, mermaid with tail and no legs. White Rooks: Underwater coral towers with flowing seaweed, shells, and bioluminescent details. White Pawns: Playful dolphins in natural leaping pose - sleek gray bodies with lighter underbellies, streamlined dorsal fins, intelligent eyes, water droplets cascading from their bodies, curved bodies mid-leap showing natural dolphin movement and grace. BLACK PIECES (Pirates): Black King: Pirate captain with tricorn hat, cutlass, eye patch, weathered face, commanding presence. Black Queen: Fierce pirate queen with flowing hair, dual cutlasses, captain's coat, formidable stance. Black Bishops: Ship's first mate with spyglass, weathered sea-worn appearance. Black Knights: Pirates on small ships, swashbuckling stance with weapons ready. Black Rooks: Pirate ships with masts, sails, Jolly Roger flags, weathered wood and rigging. Black Pawns: Small pirate cannons on wheeled carriages - weathered bronze or iron barrels, wooden carriage wheels, rope coils, metal bands, ready to fire, showing detailed cannon construction with muzzle, touch hole, and carriage details. RENDER STYLE: Photorealistic textures with cinematic fantasy lighting, dramatic shadows. White pieces: ethereal, flowing, magical ocean aesthetic with iridescent scales and flowing hair. Black pieces: weathered, rugged, swashbuckling pirate aesthetic with worn leather and sea-worn wood. All pieces rendered individually with consistent scale ratios, maintaining adventure atmosphere while recognizable as chess pieces.
anim_desc: Pirates vs Mermaids style epic sea battle captures - cinematic, swashbuckling adventure with sword combat, sea magic, and dramatic ocean moments. Animations feel like scenes from epic sea adventures. White pieces (mermaids) capture with magical precision - trident strikes, water magic blasts, sea creature attacks, or enchanting spells. Black pieces (pirates) capture using cutlass strikes, cannon fire, grappling hooks, or swashbuckling maneuvers. Mermaid King (White King) raises trident summoning massive waves or sea creatures, or strikes with trident creating water blasts. Mermaid Queen (White Queen) uses enchanting song that disorients enemies, or strikes with magical water attacks. Sea Sorcerers (White Bishops) unleash sea magic - water blasts, coral spikes, or summoning sea creatures. Mermaid Knights: Sea turtles have flippers (paddle-like swimming appendages, NOT legs) and large streamlined shells. Mermaids have fin tails and NO LEGS. Sea turtle swims forward using graceful flipper-powered swimming motion, mermaid strikes with trident while maintaining mermaid tail form, or sea turtle rams enemies with its shell using swimming motion. Both maintain their natural aquatic forms throughout all animations - sea turtle uses flippers for swimming, mermaid uses tail for swimming. Use swimming, gliding, and propelling motions. Coral Rooks: towers unleash magical water attacks or sea creature swarms. Dolphin Pawns: dolphin attacks - swift swimming strikes or propelling forward with snout strikes. Pirate Captain (Black King): cutlass strikes with precision, or calls down cannon fire from ship. Pirate Queen (Black Queen): dual cutlass attacks, or commands ship weapons. First Mate (Black Bishops): uses spyglass to call precise strikes, or coordinates attacks. Pirate Knights: ship rams enemies with swashbuckling precision. Pirate Ships (Black Rooks): cannon fire, ramming attacks, or boarding actions. Cannon Pawns: cannons fire explosive shots, muzzle flash and smoke, cannonballs strike targets, or cannons recoil and reload. ROYALTY: White King/Queen ATTACKING: Epic sea magic - trident glows, massive waves surge, sea creatures rise, magical ocean power. White King/Queen DYING: Graceful descent - returns to water, scales fade, becomes one with the ocean. Black King/Queen ATTACKING: Swashbuckling mastery - cutlasses flash, ship weapons fire, commanding presence. Black King/Queen DYING: Dramatic defeat - falls to deck, ship begins to sink, treasure lost to depths. All animations equal length (3-5 seconds), cinematic ocean lighting with underwater and surface effects, high-detail textures with ocean and ship aesthetics, epic adventure tone matching Pirates vs Mermaids universe.
